name: 4 Great Award Show Performances
short_description: The 2013 Video Music Awards over at MTV came and went with some moderate fanfare, though most people came out of it talking about Miley Cyrus’s performance more than any of the actual award winners. Since its humble beginnings in 1984, the awards show has seen some amazing performances from the music industry’s most notable artists, offering a great deal of pageantry and musicianship. Let’s take a look at some of the greatest live performances from award shows over the years.
